description:
Interact with EduBase through our MCP server. Create dynamic quizzes, manage secure exams, and automate comprehensive assessment workflows. This seamless integration empowers educators to create personalized learning experiences, conduct secure online examinations, and scale assessment solutions with enterprise-grade security and compliance. Ideal for educational institutions, corporate training departments, and certification providers seeking to transform their digital learning infrastructure with AI-powered capabilities. Integrate with your existing systems through our secure API.

Check out our GitHub page for more details and setup instructions!

edubaseApiApp.description: The integration app ID for EduBase

edubaseApiKey.description: The secret key for the EduBase API

capabilities.name: edubase_get_questions
capabilities.description: List owned and managed Quiz questions.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_question
capabilities.description: Check existing question. Questions are the lowest level in the EduBase hierarchy, serving as the building blocks for Quiz sets. To get question details, use the question export function!

capabilities.name: edubase_post_question
capabilities.description: Publish or update a question. Questions are the atomic building blocks of the EduBase Quiz system and represent the lowest level in the hierarchy (Questions -> Quiz sets -> Exams).

capabilities.name: edubase_delete_question
capabilities.description: Permanently delete a Quiz question.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_question_export
capabilities.description: Generate download link for exporting the question (in JSON format). If a previous valid link exists, it will be returned instead.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_question_id
capabilities.description: Get external unique question identifier by question identification string.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_question_id
capabilities.description: Set external unique question identifier for question identified by a question identification string.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exams
capabilities.description: List owned and managed exams. Exams are the highest level in the EduBase Quiz hierarchy, built from Quiz sets.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exam
capabilities.description: Get/check exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_exam
capabilities.description: Create a new exam from an existing Quiz set. Exams are at the top level of the EduBase Quiz hierarchy and MUST be created from existing Quiz sets. They are time-constrained, secured assessment instances of Quiz sets.

capabilities.name: edubase_delete_exam
capabilities.description: Remove/archive exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exam_users
capabilities.description: List all users on an exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_exam_users
capabilities.description: Assign user(s) to an exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_delete_exam_users
capabilities.description: Remove user(s) from an exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_exam_summary
capabilities.description: Submit a new AI exam summary.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_quiz_play_results
capabilities.description: Get detailed results for a specific Quiz play.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_quiz_results_user
capabilities.description: Get user results for a specific Quiz set.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exam_results_user
capabilities.description: Get user results for a specific exam.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exam_results_raw
capabilities.description:
Get raw results for a specific exam.
- This endpoint returns raw results, including all answers given by the user. It is not meant to be displayed to the user.
- This might require additional permissions.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_exam_certificates_user
capabilities.description: Get (the latest) certificate details for a specific exam and user.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_exam_certificates_user_download
capabilities.description: Generate download link for the latest user exam certificate. If a previous valid link exists, it will be returned instead.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_quizes
capabilities.description: List owned and managed Quiz sets. Quiz sets are named collections of questions that sit at the middle level of the EduBase Quiz hierarchy.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_quiz
capabilities.description: Get/check Quiz set. Containing questions and powering Exams.

capabilities.name: edubase_post_quiz
capabilities.description: Create a new Quiz set. Quiz sets are collections of questions that can be used for practice or to power multiple Exams.

capabilities.name: edubase_delete_quiz
capabilities.description: Remove/archive Quiz set.

capabilities.name: edubase_get_quiz_questions
capabilities.description: List all questions and question groups in a Quiz set. Quiz sets contain questions (lowest level) and can be used by exams (highest level).

capabilities.name: edubase_post_quiz_questions
capabilities.description: Assign question(s) to a Quiz set, or one of its question group. Questions can exist independently from Quiz sets.

capabilities.name: edubase_delete_quiz_questions
capabilities.description: Remove question(s) from a Quiz set, or one of its question group.
